name: Ouroboros (itch) (M. R. Williams)
description:
Ouroboros is a simple game made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #3 (theme: cycles).

The Annual Lunar Festival has come again, and it is time to choose the next Lunar Champion.

You Control a lunar snake which must steal a lantern from the tail of the last Champion, and in doing so will become the Champion to defeat come next festival.

Who will be champion in 100 years?

In Ouroboros, you begin by attempting to snatch the lantern from a snake with randomized movement. If you are successful, in the next round you will be attempting to snatch the lantern from a replay of your snake from the previous round.

See how long you can best yourself!

"Midnight Background" by TheWiseHedgehog
